SHOW_RESULT.YOU_CAN_CLOSE: You can close this window now

LOGIN.TEXT: You must sign in to continue.

SESSION_EXPIRATION.TITLE: Session expiration
SESSION_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: Your session has expired. Please sign in to continue.

MFA_REQUIRED_DIALOG.TITLE: Step-up authentication required
MFA_REQUIRED_DIALOG.INFO: To perform this action you need to execute step-up authentication.
MFA_REQUIRED_DIALOG.INFO_ROLE: To log in you need to execute step-up authentication.

NO_MFA_TOKEN.TITLE: No MFA token
NO_MFA_TOKEN.INFO: You need to have at least one active MFA token. Please manage your MFA tokens.

FOCUS_ON_MFA_DIALOG.MODAL_WARNING: Please check your browser settings if no modal window is open.

USER_NOT_ALLOWED.TITLE: Access not allowed
USER_NOT_ALLOWED.MESSAGE: Service accounts are not allowed to access this application.

CONSOLIDATOR.IDENTITY_REGISTERED_ALREADY_TITLE: We cannot automatically link these accounts.
CONSOLIDATOR.IDENTITY_IDENTICAL_TITLE: You logged in with the same account.
CONSOLIDATOR.IDENTITY_LINKED_SUBTITLE: You tried to link an account that was linked to you already.
CONSOLIDATOR.IDENTITY_UNKNOWN_TITLE: The account is not registered in the system!
CONSOLIDATOR.IDENTITY_UNKNOWN_SUBTITLE: Please log in with an account you are registered in the system!
CONSOLIDATOR.TOKEN_EXPIRED_SUBTITLE: Please close this window and refresh the web application you came from.
CONSOLIDATOR.MESSAGE_SENT_TO_SUPPORT_TITLE: Email was sent to user support.
CONSOLIDATOR.MESSAGE_SENT_TO_SUPPORT_SUBTITLE: Our user support will answer you as soon as possible to your email
CONSOLIDATOR.UNKNOWN_ERROR_SUBTITLE: Please try again later or contact the user support at

SEND_MESSAGE_TO_SUPPORT_DIALOG.TITLE: Send message to User Support
SEND_MESSAGE_TO_SUPPORT_DIALOG.SUBTITLE: You can send this message or you can write your own text. Technical info will be sent automatically.
